job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Title ML EngineerbrDuration 6 Months Contract with extensionsbrLocation Remotebr brPLEASE NOTE As per the client requirement we need to perform 5 years background check Criminal Education employment check  DMV Please confirm if you have no records in the background and you will be able to clear the background checkbrJob Descriptionbr	At least two years experience as a machine learning engineerbr	Proficiency with Python Java languagebr	Extensive knowledge of ML frameworks libraries and software architecturebr	Indepth knowledge of mathematics statistics and algorithmsbrKnowledge of CICD tools  Kubernetes is a plus
